name: Prototype#Roguelite#TCG
description:
Just an idea I had for a Roguelite TCG, it's far from complete. And I don't know when I'll return to this project. Made as a part of WGJ 78 in collaboration with mbg180 : https://soundcloud.com/mbg180 : https://mbg180.itch.io/ 

For WGJ: @MerMirakle#1754 & @mbg180#1863
